transactionId.dldescription: Unique identifier for the transaction in the source system

transactionNumber.dldescription: A visual number or identifier for the transaction (typically bounded to farm/enterprise)

postingDate.dldescription: The date of financial posting (for instance invoice date may be later than the actual sale event)

reference.dldescription: A reference code such as an invoice number or purchase order number

otherPartyId.dldescription: An identifier of another party within the source system

otherPartyContact.dldescription: Name, short form contact details of supplier/receiver. Only intended for reference, not e-commerce.

createdDate.dldescription: The date in which the transaction was created, with time-zone information if required. May be used for synchronisation.

updatedDate.dldescription: The date in which the transaction was updated, with time-zone information if required. May be used for synchronisation.

url.dldescription: Link to a source document if any

subTotal.dldescription: Sub-total of the item line amounts in the transaction

subTotalTax.dldescription: Sub-total of the tax item line amounts in the transaction

transactionLine.dldescription: Details the Transaction Line in the source system
